content: हीरः [हृ-क नि.] {@--1@} A snake. {@--2@} A necklace. {@--3@} A lion. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of the father of Śrīharṣa, the author of the Naiṣadha-charita. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. --रः, --रं {@--1@} The thunderbolt of Indra. {@--2@} A diamond; (occurring in the concluding stanza of each canto of नैषधचरित).
